mean_cn: v. 刺破（车胎等），扎，穿孔；  n. 刺孔，刺
mean_en: to make a small hole in something; to get a small hole; to suddenly make somebody feel less confident, proud, etc.
sentence: He used a needle to puncture the red balloon.
sentence_trans: 他用针去扎这个红色气球。
word_etyma: punct点，变尖 + ure名词后缀 → 点[进去] → puncture穿孔，刺穿
